description:
Yamagami Lucy sought employment as a government worker for revenge. After she was born, her parents couldn’t decide on a name, but finally chose the name “Lucy”.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Be Careful About How You Refer to Someone and Why
De l`attention à porter à la façon dont on appelle les autres
Ki o Tsukeyou Hito no Yobikata Sono Riyuu
気をつけよう 人の呼び方 その理由
